desc: Flint Naturals is a Hemp Brand born in the Pacific Northwest providing High Quality Hemp products from Oregon grown, organic hemp oil. Each of our Hemp Products are 3rd party tested for guaranteed purity and quality. We create Hemp products that empower culture, creativity and adventure.

layout.text: DISCONTINUING OUR CBD LINE ON 8/21 ORDER NOW AT 50% OFF. NO CODE NEEDED SIMPLY ADD ITEMS TO CART AND THE DISCOUNT WILL BE APPLIED. VAPES INCLUDED!
